page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: Children's Games Part One KIT-KAN A children's playground game. This game is played by any number more than three. First of all one person shouts"Last one to the lamp-post is it for Kit-Kan". Everyone runs to the lamp- post and the last one there is it."It" shuts his eyes and counts to 100 whilst everybody else hides.When "it" opens his eyes everybody tries to get back to base without being seen or touched. If the "it" sees them they both run for the base. If the "it" reaches the base first he says"Kit-Kan I see(name)" and he states where.If the other person gets to the base before "it" they say "Kit-Kan(own mame) in". The first person to fail to get home to base will be the next "it".
